Projects

EstateRAG Assistant

A GenAI-powered assistant for analyzing property documents, comparing lease agreements, and enabling intelligent Q&A across real estate records.

Built an advanced RAG pipeline for document analysis using FastAPI, Streamlit, and vector databases. Implemented document chunking, semantic search, and multi-document comparison. Features include query rewriting, context condensation, and caching strategies for optimized performance.

Tech Stack:
  • FastAPI
  • Streamlit
  • LangChain
  • OpenAI API
  • FAISS
  • PyMuPDF
  • Docker

CheckNet United

A full-stack B2B e-commerce portal for custom RFID tag orders by retailers.

Built with Angular and .NET 9 microservices, integrated with RabbitMQ, SignalR, and PostgreSQL. Implemented JWT-based auth, real-time import status updates, and Azure containerized deployments using Docker and CI/CD pipelines.

Tech Stack:
  • Angular
  • .NET 9
  • RabbitMQ
  • SignalR
  • PostgreSQL
  • Azure
  • Docker

NHS HCD and IFR Systems

Unified NHS clinical funding platform used by over 130 NHS Trusts.

Led end-to-end development of Blueteq's IFR, High Cost Drugs, and Shared Care modules. Delivered workflow digitization, NICE compliance automation, and real-time reporting. Supported Â£100M+ in annual approvals.

Tech Stack:
  • ASP.NET MVC
  • SQL Server
  • jQuery
  • NHS Spine Integration
